summary: The client requested to initiate Sprint 1, and PM Sarah confirmed the start, with the team (Mike, Alex, and Jordan) beginning to break down stories, implement, and test, while she monitors progress.

decisions.title: Initiate execution of Sprint 1
decisions.details: Team assigned to break down stories, implement, and test; PM to monitor and provide updates on milestones.

actions.task: Monitor Sprint 1 progress and update on milestones
